--- title: Downloading PDFs for Roll Call votes keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "The roll call votes of the plenary of the EU parliament are stored freely available online. So let's go and collect them with `requests` and `bs4`." description: "The roll call votes of the plenary of the EU parliament are stored freely available online. So let's go and collect them with `requests` and `bs4`." nb_path: "nbs/00_downloading_pdfs.ipynb" ---

Defining the site where everything is stored

Identifying the links

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

identify_links_for_pdfs[source]

identify_links_for_pdfs(url:str, bs_parser:str='lxml')

There are RCV (Roll Call Vote) and VOT PDF files. Links for both are extracted.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%time
rcv_pdfs, vot_pdfs = identify_links_for_pdfs(URL)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_file[source]

download_file(link:str, file_dir:Path=Path('../pdfs'))

Given a valid URL a file is downloaded.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%time
link = rcv_pdfs[0]
download_file(link)
{% endraw %}

Collecting all files

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

collect_multiple_files[source]

collect_multiple_files(links:List[str], file_dir:Path=Path('../pdfs'), dt:float=0.5)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%%time
collect_multiple_files(rcv_pdfs, dt=.01)
{% endraw %}
